Name: CSVQuoted
Description: If a string contains a space or a comma or a newline, quotes it, suitable for a field in a CSV file.
Author: David Bakin
Entries:
"this".CSVQuoted()  ==>  "this"
"pots and pans".CSVQuoted() ==> "\"pots and pans\""
"blue,red".CSVQuoted() ==> "\"blue,red\""
"embedded\"quote".CSVQuoted() ==> "\"embedded\"\"quote\""
" goodbye! ".CSVQuoted() ==> "\" goodbye! \""
